result.arabic_text: وَمِن ثَمَرَٰتِ ٱلنَّخِيلِ وَٱلۡأَعۡنَٰبِ تَتَّخِذُونَ مِنۡهُ سَكَرٗا وَرِزۡقًا حَسَنًاۚ إِنَّ فِي ذَٰلِكَ لَأٓيَةٗ لِّقَوۡمٖ يَعۡقِلُونَ
result.translation: 67. Sinaamey Yalli siinih yecee niqmootak tanim, tamiiraa kee qinabwä mexexuk gocoyuy edde taskireenii kee meqe rizqhiy tattakammeeni kaak haysittan, (tamah gocoy caraamu yakkek duma oobe Aayat kinnuk) diggah amahat Yallih duddaa kee kay inkittinaane tascasse asta edde tan kaskassoowa marah.
